programme.title: Terrifier
programme.desc: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to the timid town of Miles County where he targets a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.

programme.title: Await the Dawn
programme.desc: A troubled family traveling cross country are highjacked by a desperate man. Only to discover he's running from something more dangerous than he is.

programme.title: Lasso
programme.desc: An Active Senior Tour group outing turns deadly when the crazed, bloodthirsty cowboys from a local rodeo attraction start abducting and killing people!

programme.title: Eden
programme.desc: When a US soccer team gets stranded on a deserted island after a plane crash they must face difficult choices to survive. Modern day Lord of the Flies.

programme.title: Bring Me a Dream
programme.desc: On the run for murder, Avery Quinn desperate to prove her innocence, summons the legendary Sandman.

programme.title: Evil Dead Trap
programme.desc: A TV station employee takes a camera crew out to an abandoned factory to investigate a purported snuff film that was made there, only to end up running for her life.

programme.title: Estranged
programme.desc: A modern Gothic tale of a wheelchair-bound amnesiac, a spooky old mansion, and the family that lives within - harboring dark secrets and shocking motives.

programme.title: The Last Boy
programme.desc: With the world's end imminent, a dying mother sends her young son on a journey to the place which grants wishes. The film's inspired by the works of 13th century Sufi mystic and poet, Rumi.

programme.title: Robot Overlords
programme.desc: Earth has been conquered by robots from a distant galaxy. Survivors are confined to their houses and must wear electronic implants, risking incineration by robot sentries if they venture outside.

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.

programme.title: Radius
programme.desc: Following a car crash, a man wakes with no memory. As he seeks help, he discovers only dead bodies. He soon discovers the horrible truth; any living thing that comes within a 50-foot radius of him dies instantly.

programme.title: Await the Dawn
programme.desc: A troubled family traveling cross country are highjacked by a desperate man. Only to discover he's running from something more dangerous than he is.

programme.title: Vanishing on 7th Street
programme.desc: A blackout causes a city's population to vanish. A handful of survivors realize they escape the darkness.

programme.title: Fear Dot Com
programme.desc: Detective Mike Reilly and Department of Health researcher Terry Huston try to uncover the truth behind a series of murders in which the victims have just one thing in common: all were logged into the website fear.com 48 hours before their violent and inexplicable death. As Mike decides to also log into this deadly site he finds himself in a life-and-death confrontation with a sadistic murderer. Faced with his own worst fears his time is running out...
